Name: Hoa Sua
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Light and easy drinking - the rum flavour shines through.
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly for Hoa Sua catering school in Vietnam using locally available products.
Nutrition: One serving of Hoa Sua contains 164 calories
